title: Cumulative Cases of Ebola
notes: It includes probable, confirmed and suspected cases

title: Cumulative Deaths from Ebola
notes: It includes probable, confirmed and suspected cases

title: People Receiving Food Assistance
notes: Data refers to people receiving food in Sierra Leone, Liberia and Guinea only

title: Currently Affected Countries
notes: Countries with an active EVD outbreak are Guinea, Liberia, Sierra Leone, and Italy.Previously affected countries Nigeria, Senegal, Spain, United States of America, Mali, and United Kingdom are not included as they have been declared ebola free by the WHO.
